Mr. Edward A. Hodge, General JVfcinager
March 12, 1964
Page #2
If you would like to have additional information about the use to which
this poem will be put, may I suggest that you contact Dr. Robert Goodell,
Chief, Radio English-Teaching Branch, Voice of America, mshington, D.C.
(Hi one: WO 3-6378)
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
